title: Mushroom body output neurons encode valence and guide memory-based action selection in <italic>Drosophila</italic>
impact-statement: Output neurons in the mushroom body of the fruit fly brain encode the positive or negative survival value of stimuli, enabling insects to choose adaptive approach and avoidance behaviors through associative learning.
